title: Cant acces club
body: Writing this for a friend cause he is to lazy :(((. Ever since he updated the client he cant access our club anymore. Hes the leader and all our friends can see him as the owner but when he goes into the club tab it says hes not in one. His tag is xFrits and our club is TriE. Is there a fix?

replies.body: There may be a syncing issue preventing him from seeing it, I can try booping it but Clubs are currently inactive per the [service status](http://status.leagueoflegends.com/#na) page for maintenance.  I can look into this for him once clubs are back up and running.
